Name: Skewed Gambling Task: Deconstructing neural predictors of risky choice
Acknowledgements: We thank Kiefer Katovich, Josiah Leong, and Mirre Stallen for assistance with data collection, as well as Russell Poldrack, and Spanlab for feedback on previous drafts.

GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting neuroimaging datasets to BIDS, requiring neither coding nor knowledge of the BIDS specification
